Title: FLOSS Weekly 731: Confidential Computing - Dan Middleton, Confidential Computing Consortium
Description:
Dan Middleton, of Intel and the Confidential Computing Consortium (CCC), dives deep on the topic of confidential computing (CoCo) and many related concerns, such as Trusted Execution Environments with Doc Searls and Jonathan Bennett.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Jonathan Bennett

Guest: Dan Middleton

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly

Think your open source project should be on FLOSS Weekly? Email floss@twit.tv.
